name: url-lib
description: A simple, lightweight string utility for Node and browsers that supports serializing and parsing URLs and query strings.

scripts.dist: npm run dist:core && npm run dist:all
scripts.dist:all: mkdir -p dist && cat index.js getCacheDefeatStr.js parseUrl.js > dist/url-lib.js
scripts.gzip: npm run gzip:core && npm run gzip:all
scripts.gzip:all: npm run minify:all && gzip -c dist/url-lib.min.js > dist/url-lib.min.js.gz
scripts.gzip:core: npm run minify:core && gzip -c dist/url-lib-core.min.js > dist/url-lib-core.min.js.gz
scripts.minify: npm run minify:core && npm run minify:all
scripts.minify:all: npm run dist:all && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --output dist/url-lib.min.js dist/url-lib.js
scripts.minify:core: npm run dist:core && uglifyjs --compress --mangle --comments --output dist/url-lib-core.min.js dist/url-lib-core.js
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.validate:ci: npm run lint && npm run test-coverage:ci
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A dist
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --message 'Patch release v%s' && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --message 'Minor release v%s' && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm version major --message 'Major release v%s' && npm publish
